original_text: Even they sent, and took Jeremiah out of the court of the prison, and committed him unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, that he should carry him home: so he dwelt among the people.
korean_text: 사람을 보내어 예레미야를 감옥 뜰에서 데리고 사반의 손자 아히감의 아들 그다랴에게 넘겨서 그를 집으로 데려가게 하매 그가 백성 가운데에 사니라

sentences.original_text: and took Jeremiah out of the court of the prison
and committed him unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam
that he should carry him home
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 집으로 데려가게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: so he dwelt among the people
